abstract: If it survives an appeal, the verdict late Thursday would be the nation’s largest award of damages to an individual suing a tobacco company.
snippet: If it survives an appeal, the verdict late Thursday would be the nation’s largest award of damages to an individual suing a tobacco company.
lead_paragraph: Legal experts predict that thousands of tobacco lawsuits could gain momentum in Florida after a Fort Lauderdale jury ordered Philip Morris USA to pay $300 million to a former smoker who says she needs a lung transplant.

headline.print_headline: Former Smoker Wins Case Against Philip Morris USA
